title: #97: Let Your False Flag Fly | Ole Dammegard
description:
When you want to talk about the modern history of false flag attacks and how they are used to shape perceptions and affect governmental policy, there is nobody better to discuss the methods used than Ole Dammegard from Light on Conspiracies.

From the unusual disappearance from the media of the Las Vegas shooting story to the permits for the rally in the wake of the Parkland school shooting that was pulled BEFORE the actual shooting even happened, Ole has the ability to calmly explain the problems with the official story and where to look to find the answers needed.

Get ready for a wild ride down the rabbit hole of government-sanctioned terror on a global scale with the best in the business: Ole Dammegard.

Controlled Demolition on Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08M21XKJ5
